name: FigAct - Figma Designs to ReactJS
description:
FigAct is a plugin to convert Figma designs into ReactJS project.


All you need to do is just download the project generated automatically by FigAct. Typing npm install and npm run start into your terminal to run ReactJS project (Please make sure that you already have Node.js installed in your local machine).


Visit our website for demos and documents: https://figact.ml/


Thanks for downloading and using FigAct:

This is our university thesis. If there is any issues or suggestions, please write down so we can listen.
